entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 10:22 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 98.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: WSW 65 km/h gust 76 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
